title: Red Sunday: the story of the Battle of Little Big Horn
creator_credit: James B. Kelly, James R. Graff, Robert A. Henkel and Pyramid Films
brief_description: A study of the Battle of Little Big Horn which weaves a wealth of original drawings (mostly done by Indian who were participants of the actual battle), photographs and paintings, both by Indian and white artists with recreated live cavalry action on the site itself. Narrated by John McIntire. Suitable for upper secondary level.
